text: Lelo Abimeleki na wanhu weng'ha wawele hamwe na heye, nawakwina kuluta kuli chidunda cha Salimoni. Abimeleki nakebata iwago mmoko mwa heye na kudumula nhagala imwe kuli igodi, nakebata na kulipika hali mayega ga heye na kuwalonjela wala wanhu wawele hamwe na heye, “Lelo chila chomlinguchona heni ndita, namwe mdite hihyo himahima.”
